title: What are the chords to “How great is our God”? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you mean the Chris Tomlin, Jesse Reeves and Ed Cash song, here is how I play it. (I had to use …… for spaces to line the chords up). Hopefully it will render properly for you. 4/4 key of GIntro G (2 bars) Verse 1G…………….………………………..Em7The splendour of the King, clothed in majesty……………………….Cmaj7………………………………Let all the earth rejoice, Let all the earth rejoice……..G……………………………………….Em7He wrap Himself in light, and the darkness tries to hide…………………………CMaj7………………………It trembles at His voice, trembles at his Voice Chorus………..GHow great is our God, Sing with me………Em7How great is our God, All will see………Cmaj7………D…………….GHow great , How great is our God Verse 2 (lyrics omitted - same chords as Verse 1)——Chorus repeatBridgeG……………………………….Em7Name above all names, worthy of praise……Cmaj7…………………..D……………..GMy heart will sing: How great is our God…………..G……………………………….Em7He’s the name above all names, worthy of praise…..Cmaj7……………………..D……………..GMy heart will sing: How great is our God Chorus repeat 2x Disclaimer:This is for private practice and educational use only. Any public performance should follow the rules (typically licence-sing) in your jurisdiction.

It's a 1 6m 4 5 in the chorus, and I'd use the G shapes to play it from this chart: Ultimate Worship Guitar Chord System - Learn Rock Worship Guitar You can change key to suit your voice either with a capo, or picking one of the other rows in the chart, to play the 1 6m 4 5 from
